page.title: 14Modern Fashions
page.content: Nowadays some people have coloured and spikey hair which we cll a "punk" hairstyle.Boys tend to have short hair but a few have long hair down to their shoulders.Girls have a mixture of long and short hair both of which are popular.Some boys have their hair shaved right off.There are not many barbers now who only cut men's hair.Instead there are Unisex hair stylists who cut and style both men and womens hair.r. We wear a uniform at school.Girls wear a maroon cardigan and grey skirt and boys wear a maroon jumper,maroon & gold tie and grey trousers. Out of school boys and girls both wear jeans or "baggies" which are loose trousers with lots of pockets and zips.Girls like to wear earings and so do lots of boys now but we are not supposed to at school.
